description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. "Slow and steady wins the race?"  That's for chumps!  For this turtle, it's all about pure speed and sweet spin jumps!  Compete in the ultimate hurdle challenge solo, or take it on with a buddy for some intense multiplayer action in this survival marathon of madness!  Modeled after the games of yesteryear, this is the second entry in the Holmade Games 8-Bit Series.
